name: ping
description: Test the bot's reaction time

name: commands
description: Returns this command list.

name: invite
description: Link to invite the bot to your server.

name: say
description: Make me say stuff!

name: stefan
description: Memes of my cuckold stalker!

name: phin
description: Memes that got Biggot banned from my server!

name: youtube
description: Searches a youtube video and returns link.

name: google
description: Returns last 5 google seach results.

name: eightball
description: Have your question answered by Phan.

name: calc
description: The bot does quick mafs for you.

name: fortune
description: Interested in a fortune cookie?

name: remindme
description: Set a ping reminder in x hour, minutes or seconds

name: horoscope
description: Consult your daily horoscope reading.

name: lieornot
description: I'll tell you if that's a lie or not!

name: question
description: Return a random question

name: weather
description: Display the weather in a city.

name: emoji
description: Emoji searching!

name: tempmod
description: Tempoerarily make someone a moderator

name: gag
description: Prevent a user from talking for 60 seconds

name: mute
description: Silently prevent a user from talking for an hour

name: hush
description: Enable slowmode for a certain duration

name: naughtystep
description: Mute a user for 60s next time they talk.

name: redcard
description: Mute a user for 60m next time they talk.

name: censor
description: Delete x messages from a specific user.

name: dunce
description: Toss a dunce cap onto a user of your choosing

name: undunce
description: Free a user from the tourment of being dunced.

name: jumblejinx
description: Jumble up a target's messages

name: hangjinx
description: Turn your target's messages into a game of hangman

name: spacejinx
description: Give your target's messages some random spaces

name: cleanse
description: Remove the target's jinx

name: setup
description: Run this command to configure the bot to your server.

name: xat
description: Base command for xat.com's information

name: xat x2d
description: Convert xats to days.

name: xat dx
description: Convert days to xats.

name: xat id
description: Get the ID of a registered user.

name: xat regname
description: Get the regname associated to a user's ID.

name: xat find
description: Find a user from their regname or id.

name: xat xatstocash
description: Convert xats to a dollar amount.

name: xat cashtoxats
description: Convert dollars to a xat amount.

name: xat whatis
description: View the status of a power or smiley.

name: xat chatprice
description: Get price updates for a chat group.

name: xat chatinfo
description: Display information of a chat group.

name: xat xatsearch
description: Return xat search results.

name: xat price
description: Get the price of a power.

name: xat promoted
description: Display a list of currently promoted chats by language.

name: xat popular
description: Display a list of the most popular chats by language.

name: xat featured
description: Display a list of featured chats by language.

name: xat supported
description: Display a list of the most supported chats by language.

name: xat latest
description: Show information of the most recently released power.

name: xat shortname
description: Lookup the price of a shortname.

name: xat userinfo
description: Displays xat information of a user.

name: xat vols
description: Get a list of the current xat Volunteers.

name: nick
description: Update your username

name: top
description: View the top 10 most active users

name: profile
description: Display your server profile

name: edit
description: Customize your profile using this command

name: xats
description: Display your xat wallet.

name: value
description: Display your power value.

name: daily
description: Daily 100 xat claim.

name: work
description: Perform some manual labor for a few xats

name: leaderboard
description: Top 10 richest xat users.

name: marry
description: Marry a target user.

name: bff
description: BFF a target user.

name: divorce
description: Divorce your current partner.

name: transfer
description: Donate your xats to another user.

name: buy
description: Purchase a power straight from the store.

name: sell
description: Sell a power back to the store.

name: trade
description: Offer to exchange xats and powers with another user.

name: gamble
description: Feeling lucky? Gamble for a chance to win here

name: powers
description: Display a list of currently owned powers.

name: has
description: View a user's power status

name: toggle
description: Toggle the display of a power on or off.

name: lottery
description: Participate in the xat lottery for a chance to win big.

name: foe
description: Burn bridges with this command and set users as your foe

name: gift
description: Show your appreciation for a friend with a gift

name: gifts
description: View your gift current inventory

name: zoom
description: Zoom in on a user's Discord avatar

name: tickle
description: Setup a tickle notification to know when your word is said

name: xd
description: Convert your xats into days

name: auction
description: Compete in bidding wars for a chance at a lower ID!
